full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE'I GDONG CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS BZLOG BYED BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO SENG GE'I GDONG CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS BZLOG BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, MCHOD DPON BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG, RANG RANG SKAL MNYAM @005B GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN BA 'BYUNG DAM SNYOMS PA'I BSAM PAS BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS ^BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA RTEN NAS BGYIS PA 'DI LA NONGS PA'I TSOGS MCHIS PA THAMS CAD BLA MA MKHA' 'GRO'I TSOGS LA CHAGS SO, ,BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,CUNG ZAD DGE BAS BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD MI MTHUN PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
